text: Conversion rate increased by 4.49% WoW despite a 3.15% decrease in sessions, suggesting improved targeting quality.
Revenue per Session improved by 3.49% WoW, compensating for lower traffic volume.
Monthly comparison shows concerning trends in revenue (-1.10%), RPS (-6.58%), and conversion rate (-7.79%).
Basket size continues to grow both weekly (+1.20%) and monthly (+6.13%), suggesting effective cross-selling.
Checkout completion rate improved weekly (+1.16%), suggesting UI/UX improvements are effective.
Add to Cart to Checkout transition improved by 2.44% WoW, but shows significant decline MoM (-14.30%).
Product Views to Add to Cart shows strong monthly improvement (+14.24%), indicating effective product presentation.
Month-over-month decline in checkout completion (6.20%) requires investigation into potential payment issues.
Facebook shows solid growth in RPS (-4.86% WoW) despite slight month-over-month decline, and contributes 46.12% of total traffic.
Google traffic has the lowest conversion rate (0.62%) but shows promising RPS growth both weekly (+3.97%) and monthly (+22.55%).
Facebook_todbees is underperforming with significant RPS decline both weekly (-6.63%) and monthly (-44.48%).
Instagram has high conversion (2.44%) and RPS (₹43.91) despite recent weekly decline, suggesting high-quality traffic.
Sets remains the dominant category (45.84% of revenue) with strong weekly growth (+7.44%) despite monthly decline (-15.17%).
3 pc. Sets shows strongest growth both weekly (+12.59%) and monthly (+57.40%), suggesting increased customer preference for value-oriented offerings.
2 pc. Sets has significant weekly decline (-11.77%) despite strong monthly growth (+29.13%), requiring investigation into recent changes.
Party Dresses shows concerning decline both weekly (-7.45%) and monthly (-11.57%), suggesting potential issues with this category.
App significantly outperforms website with 3x higher conversion rate (3.65% vs 1.22%) and 4x higher RPS (₹67.81 vs ₹17.16).
iOS users (30.06% of traffic) show nearly 2x higher conversion than Android users and stronger RPS growth both weekly (+5.24%) and monthly (+4.44%).
Android continues to dominate traffic (68.15%) but shows concerning monthly RPS decline (-11.82%).
Despite accounting for only 9.36% of sessions, the app generates 29.78% of total revenue, highlighting major platform performance gap.
App promotion: Given the app's superior performance metrics, invest in driving more traffic to the app through app-install campaigns and in-website promotions.
Checkout optimization: Investigate and address the significant month-over-month decline in checkout completion rate to reverse the negative trend.
Google traffic strategy: Capitalize on the strong MoM growth in Google traffic by increasing investment in better-performing campaigns.
3 pc. Sets expansion: Expand the 3 pc. Sets category with additional styles given its strong growth both weekly and monthly.
Party Dresses review: Evaluate pricing, styling, and promotion strategy for Party Dresses to address concerning weekly and monthly declines.
